description: Go ahead. Get messy. Their men's Spotless Plaid Short Sleeve Shirt can handle anything you throw at it. Made from soft, cooling polyester bluesign® approved fabric, this classic men's plaid shirt has built-in HeiQ Stain Away technology to resist unexpected spills, drips, and dirt. Just toss this easy-care staple in the washer and dryer, and this wrinkle-resistant shirt will look like new. The four-way stretch fabric adds freedom of movement while durable shoulder panels feel good under a pack. A zippered pocket at the chest safely stores small essentials, and a secret microfiber lining in the front hem safely cleans glasses, phone screens, or camera lenses.
name: Royal Robbins Spotless Plaid SS - Mens
